channel.title: Comments on: Light my way
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: I sat outside and had a beer last night in your honor... just thought you'd like to know:)monica
item.content:encoded: I sat outside and had a beer last night in your honor… just thought you’d like to know:)monica

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: perfect for summer evenings on the patio...sigh...I love time to enjoy those sorts of things. Enjoy them for me too, ok?monica
item.content:encoded: perfect for summer evenings on the patio…sigh…I love time to enjoy those sorts of things. Enjoy them for me too, ok?monica
